Get NFL schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

Source: R/get_nfl_schedule.R
get_nfl_schedule.Rd

Get NFL schedule for a specific year from ESPN's API

get_nfl_schedule(season)

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get standings from 2018 season
get_nfl_schedule(season = "2018")
#> Returning data for 2018!
#> # A tibble: 333 x 11
#>    game_id home_team_id away_team_id uid   date  name  shortName  year
#>    <chr>          <int>        <int> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>     <int>
#>  1 400999…           12           10 s:20… 2018… Tenn… TEN @ KC   2017
#>  2 400999…           14            1 s:20… 2018… Atla… ATL @ LAR  2017
#>  3 400999…           30            2 s:20… 2018… Buff… BUF @ JAX  2017
#>  4 400999…           18           29 s:20… 2018… Caro… CAR @ NO   2017
#>  5 400999…           21            1 s:20… 2018… Atla… ATL @ PHI  2017
#>  6 400999…           17           10 s:20… 2018… Tenn… TEN @ NE   2017
#>  7 400999…           23           30 s:20… 2018… Jack… JAX @ PIT  2017
#>  8 400999…           16           18 s:20… 2018… New … NO @ MIN   2017
#>  9 400999…           17           30 s:20… 2018… Jack… JAX @ NE   2017
#> 10 400999…           21           16 s:20… 2018… Minn… MIN @ PHI  2017
#> # … with 323 more rows, and 3 more variables: seasonType <int>,
#> #   home_team <chr>, away_team <chr>
